channel.title: Devolution 1.1 (change experience points)
channel.description:
1) How do i change the amount of experience rate for training combat(attack, strength, defence, ect)? 2) How do i change the amount of experience rate for training skills(woodcut, thieveing, ect)? 3) What is a good experience rate for both of these thats not too fast or too slow(leveling in general)?
Thanks in advance :)
